did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Institut zum Studium der Judenfrage collection

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace

did.abstract: German antisemitic propaganda, including clippings, leaflets, and posters. Collected by the Institut zum Studium der Judenfrage.
did.langmaterial: Languages represented in the collection: German

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Institut zum Studium der Judenfrage collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Increments may have been received since this finding aid was prepared. Please check Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat to find the full extent of the collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: German antisemitic propaganda, including clippings, leaflets, and posters. Collected by the Institut zum Studium der Judenfrage.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in two subseries, Collected Material and Publication of the Institut zum Studium der Judenfrage.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

did.unittitle: German anti-Semitic fliers and similar material
"Aber der Zoll faßte sie doch!" Angriff
"Das Füllhorn des Elends: Deutsche Farmer in Weizengürtel der Prärie," Angriff
"Der hessische Bauer im Kampf um Acker und Hof," Frankfurter Volksblatt
Felix Perles, "Die Wanderungen der Juden," Königsberger Jüdisches Gemeindeblatt
Corneliu Zelia Codreanu, "Eiserne Garde," Völkischer Beobachter
Wilhelm Ziegler, "Das Ende des Zweiten Reiches," Völkischer Beobachter
"Jude, wie siehst Du aus?" 12 Uhr Blatt
Publication of the Institut zum Studium der Judenfrage
